mapper.select: SELECT m.`id`,m.`Name`,m.`img`,m.`path` FROM `user` AS u JOIN us_ro AS ur ON u.`id`=ur.uid JOIN role AS r ON ur.`rid`=r.`id` JOIN ro_me AS rm ON r.`id`=rm.`rid` JOIN menu AS m ON rm.`mid`=m.`id` WHERE u.`id`=#{id}

SELECT u.`id`,u.`name`,u.`password`,u.`username`,c.`name` AS college,GROUP_CONCAT(r.`name`) AS role FROM `user` AS u JOIN college AS c ON u.`collid`=c.`id` JOIN us_ro AS ur ON u.`id`=ur.`uid` JOIN role AS r ON ur.`rid` =r.`id` GROUP BY u.`id`

SELECT u.`id`,u.`name`,u.`username`,c.`name` AS college,GROUP_CONCAT(r.`name`) AS role FROM `user` AS u JOIN college AS c ON u.`collid`=c.`id` JOIN us_ro AS ur ON u.`id`=ur.`uid` JOIN role AS r ON ur.`rid` =r.`id` WHERE CONCAT(u.`id`,u.`name`,u.`username`,c.`name`,r.`name`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') GROUP BY u.`id`
SELECT r.`name` as role,GROUP_CONCAT(m.`name`) as menu,GROUP_CONCAT(m.`img`) as img FROM ro_me AS rm JOIN role AS r ON rm.`rid`=r.`id` JOIN menu AS m ON rm.`mid`=m.`id` GROUP BY r.`id`

SELECT rs.`id`,u.`name`,c.`name` AS classname,cu.`name` AS curr,ce.`name` AS college FROM relationship AS rs JOIN `user` AS u ON rs.`teacherid`=u.`id` JOIN class AS c ON rs.`classid`=c.`id` JOIN curriculum AS cu ON rs.`currid`=cu.`id` JOIN college AS ce ON rs.`collegeid`=ce.`id`

SELECT rs.`id`,u.`name`,c.`name` AS classname,cu.`name` AS curr,ce.`name` AS college FROM relationship AS rs JOIN `user` AS u ON rs.`teacherid`=u.`id` JOIN class AS c ON rs.`classid`=c.`id` JOIN curriculum AS cu ON rs.`currid`=cu.`id` JOIN college AS ce ON rs.`collegeid`=ce.`id` WHERE CONCAT(rs.`id`,u.`name`,c.`name`,cu.`name`,ce.`name`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT sc.`id`,u.`name` AS stname,u.`username`,c.`name` AS clname FROM studentclass AS sc JOIN `user` AS u ON sc.`studentid`=u.`id` JOIN class AS c ON sc.`classid`= c.`id`

SELECT sc.`id`,u.`name` AS stname,u.`username`,c.`name` AS clname FROM studentclass AS sc JOIN `user` AS u ON sc.`studentid`=u.`id` JOIN class AS c ON sc.`classid`= c.`id` WHERE CONCAT(u.`name`,u.`username`,c.`name`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT m.* FROM ro_me AS rm JOIN role AS r ON rm.`rid`=r.`id` JOIN menu AS m ON rm.`mid`=m.`id` WHERE r.`name`= #{name}
SELECT u.*,co.`name` AS college FROM studentclass AS sc JOIN `user` AS u ON sc.`studentid`=u.`id` JOIN class AS c ON sc.`classid`=c.`id` JOIN college AS co ON u.`collid`=co.`id` WHERE c.`id`= #{id}
SELECT * FROM questionnaire AS q WHERE q.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') AND q.`batch`=#{batch}
SELECT q.`id`,q.`name`,b.`id` AS batchid,b.`name` AS batch,b.`state` AS state FROM questionnaire AS q JOIN batch AS b ON q.`batch`=b.`id`
